EmailTemplate.name: 202005_BK_Webinar_Inflight_Internet_Connectivity_MC.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder! Webinar Today on Inflight Internet Connectivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Have you signed up yet? There’s still time to register for today’s webinar.
Date: May 28th, 2020 Start Time: 8 p.m. EDT Duration: 30 Minutes + 10 Minute for Q&A
Please join us for an informative webinar as we discuss inflight internet connectivity for general aviation and AeroWave 100, which provides this service, including:
- Benefits for every type of flying; from pleasure to business, and pilot to passenger - Features and capabilities to consider when choosing a connectivity solution - Cost factors for consideration - Introduce the new BendixKing data plan on AeroWave which promises to be a game-changer in the market
The webinar will be given by BendixKing’s Sapan Shah, Sr. Product Manager who has years of experience in connectivity and communication. REGISTER HERE <[[https://bkx.bendixking.com/forms/webinar/?id=aw01]]>
